section.heading: Service by publication on nonresidents, absent defendants, and unknown heirs or devisees.

para.text: In actions specified by subsection (b) of this section, publication may be substituted for personal service of process upon a defendant who can not be found and who is shown by affidavit to be a nonresident, or to have been absent from the District for at least six months, or against the unknown heirs or devisees of deceased persons.
actions for child custody under D.C. Official Code, Title 16, Chapter 45 [repealed];
actions for foreclosure of mortgages and deeds of trust;
actions for the establishment of title to real estate by possession;
actions for the enforcement of mechanics’ liens, and other liens against real or personal property within the District; and
actions that have for their immediate object the enforcement or establishment of any lawful right, claim, or demand to or against any real or personal property within the jurisdiction of the court.

annotations.annotation: This section is referenced in § 13-335, § 13-337, and § 16-4808.
